DataElement.preferredName: Patient Visit Surgical Procedure Orthopedics Lower Extremity Performed Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text field when other is chosen from a list of values for information related to the clinical encounter that encompasses planned and unplanned trial intervention surgical procedure performed on the skeletal system (bones and joints) of the limb that is composed of the hip, thigh, leg and foot.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Visit Surgical Procedure Orthopedics Lower Extremity Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the clinical encounter that encompasses planned and unplanned trial intervention surgical procedure performed on the skeletal system (bones and joints) of the limb that is composed of the hip, thigh, leg and foot.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A visit by a patient or study participant to a medical professional.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Concepts.definition: A visit by a patient or study participant to a medical professional.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: Orthopedics is the branch of surgery broadly concerned with the skeletal system (bones and joints). (from On-line Medical Dictionary):Definition not available.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: The branch of surgery broadly concerned with the skeletal system (bones and joints).
The limb that is composed of the hip, thigh, leg and foot.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.
